artist: Painter: After David Teniers, the Younger; Engraver: Andrew Lawrence; Publisher: Pierre Rémy
description: at the edge of a village, three men in conversation each leaning on his walking stick; woman entering cottage at right; grinding wheel lower right; church in background
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in image lower right: AL Sculpt 1742 | below image in black: D. Teniers pinxit  A.Laurent Sculp / LA CONVERSATION / Grave d\'apres le Tableau Original de D. Teniers, de 3 pieds 5 ponces de hauteur, sur 5 pieds 1 ponces de Largeur / Se vend a Paris chez Remy Peintre tenant Magazin de Tableaux, rue de Tournon vis a vis l\'Hotel des Ambassadeurs Extraordinaires, qui en a le Tableau Original / et chez Major rue St. Jacques vis a vis los Charniers de S. Benoist | on sheet in pencil: 2-459
title: La Conversation
